Package com.vventuri.desafiopubfuture.repositories

Interface ContaRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Conta,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Conta,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Conta,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Conta>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Conta,Integer>
